title: I write song lyrics. How do I apply to be a lyricist or song writer? - Quora

response.answer_text: It sounds like you’re already a lyricist if you write song lyrics. To be a songwriter is another thing. I would look into and instrument like guitar or piano. Take some lessons online if you can on music composition. Learn the basic about harmony, melody and structure. This is where you learn to be a songwriter. You have lyrics down pack already so now you can move on be complete. A songwriter’s job is to create the lyrics and music or just the music. And music being the melodies and harmonies.

There’s a couple of ways to break into songwriting. Lyric writers would benefit from hooking up with a musician that can play guitar or piano or both. There are also lyric writing contest. There are also publishers you can submit to. You have some options.
